summary: This paper is for applying for a passport. A passport is a special identity book you need if you want to travel to other countries. You fill out this form to ask the government to give you one.
eli10: Imagine you want to go visit your aunt in a village very far away, across a big river or even mountains, in a different land. To show everyone who you are and that you are allowed to be there, you need a special little book called a passport. This paper is like your letter asking the village elders to give you that special book so you can visit your aunt safely.
keyPoints: This paper helps you get a passport.
You need a passport to visit other countries, far away from home.
You must write your personal details on this paper carefully.
A passport is a very important paper to prove who you are when you travel.
It helps you cross borders and visit new places legally.
steps: Step 1: Get this paper from the government office or a trusted official.
Step 2: Fill in all your personal information, like your name, age, and where you live, on the paper.
Step 3: Collect any other papers they ask for, like your birth certificate or recent photos of yourself.
Step 4: Take the filled-out paper and all your other documents to the government office or official where you got the form.
Step 5: Wait for them to make your passport, and then you can pick it up.
